00014                 return 0;

00018                 return 0;

00031 class ReadWriteLock : private boost::noncopyable {
00032 private:
00033         boost::shared_mutex rwMutex_;
00034 public:
00035         ReadWriteLock() {
00036         }
00037 
00038         ~ReadWriteLock() {
00039         }
00040 
00044         inline int acquire_read_lock() {
00045                 rwMutex_.lock_shared();
00046                 return 0;
00047         }
00051         inline int acquire_write_lock() {
00052                 rwMutex_.lock();
00053                 return 0;
00054         }
00058         inline int release_read_lock() {
00059                 rwMutex_.unlock_shared();
00060                 return 0;
00061         }
00065         inline int release_write_lock() {
00066                 rwMutex_.unlock();
00067                 return 0;
00068         }
00069 
00070 };
